website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, the sustainable materials that this broom is made up of make it worth considering for eco-conscious consumers who also like its small size.
pros: Stands out for its large, circular handle that provides leverage
We love that the plastic components are made from recycled materials
cons: Some breakage with typical use noted
Bristles are a bit too flexible for some messes

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product - The brushes are not good at sweeping, and you can not sweep against an edge. After you realize that the brush is awful - the seller will charge you a restocking fee. Avoid this product - there are many better and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: parrott

customer_reviews.title: The right tool for the job
customer_reviews.text: It's not clear how we kept our counters clean before having this. It's sort of hilarious in that it makes you feel like a waiter in a fancy restaurant, but we use it to quickly clean off the crumbs and coffee grounds before wiping down the counters with something wet. The quality rubber in the pan and the curve of the real wood handle really give this a high-quality, right-tool-for-the-job feel. When the bristles get too gross someday, I'm sure we'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hughes

customer_reviews.title: I Really Wanted to Like This
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken the advice of another buyer who said the "little handle keeps falling off." That might not be a big deal for some but it would get old after awhile. Also, the back of the dustpan does not sit flush with the wall. I considered just hanging it in reverse so it would be flush with the wall but that little brush falling off too easily is what got me.
customer_reviews.author: MEW

customer_reviews.title: SLEEK AND FUNCTIONAL !
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty duster and pan ! It is so functional too ! I especially love how the dustpan has quite the grip and prevents trash from going under neath the pan. I also especially love how durable and hefty the brush is !
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Lost a bundle of whiskers in the first few uses
customer_reviews.text: Got this for whisking up cat litter scattered around the litter box. Nice design concept and appearance, but the first few uses were as much for picking up brush whiskers that fell out as for cat litter. One entire bundle of whiskers eventually fell out. No more have since fallen out, so if I don't lose any more I may just have gotten a substandard one. ***Update: the company quickly replaced the product, and the replacement was flawless. Im updating my review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphson

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: It should be much easier to find a good dust pan with a brush, but for some reason, manufacturers continue to screw up this simple thing...so, I am very happy to report that this dustpan and brush set is excellent and well-made! Thanks for making and selling a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Well made! I love that it looks modern and is a bit more eco friendly. The scraper on the reverse side of the brush is nice for in the kitchen. For some reason we always get a piece of baby spinach on the floor and it quickly seems to get stuck to it, but the scraper makes it so easy to get off. I put a command hook under my sink and it fits so nicely under there! I love not having to take out my broom from the other side of the house to clean my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Witchy

customer_reviews.title: Great tiny brush
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tiny brush for my bathroom sink - I was tired of using toilet paper to brush all the hairs from the edge of the sink in. This does the trick! I hang it on the wall near the sink and use it every time I'm done trimming. Great product I'm glad I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Duchin

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The dustpan is made of a soft flimsy plastic, so thin that the front edge is not flat, but curves upwards on either end. Try sweeping into a dust pan that doesn't lay flat. Totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Ron & June Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Makes Kids Help
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed this little gadget. Someone recommended it for counter tops and I thought it seemed excessive, but after 4 kids I am surrounded by crumbs all day long so I gave it a shot! I feel like it helps me keep crumbs off the floor that always manage to fall from the counter no matter how careful I am. Plus my kids love using it so that's worth the money alone.
customer_reviews.author: WKET

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, super handy, and super duper quality + function!
customer_reviews.text: Nobody puts this baby in a broom closet; it seems silly but it feels like a mini work of art, a modern sculpture-esque tool as it stands upright on its own - sans pedestal. And it works even better than it looks ! Imagine, a dustpan that actually catches every sweep and holds it. I got it for my bedroom with hardwood floors - to do quick sweeps as needed so I don’t have to bother with a swiffer or vacuum. Works great for dog hair too as the “rubber” lip on the dustpan catches everything like magic! So much joy and so much to say about this $9 little wonder. *love*
customer_reviews.author: D. Singh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Delivered April 5, 2017, minimal-moderate use, handle broke 4/21/17 when picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got the tiny team mini dustpan for my daughter, who at 1.5 years started to want to me help clean around the house. There are kids play sets out there, but why not get a stylish looking actual dustpan for her? Also, the round handle works better for a more flexible grip for tiny, uncoordinated children's hands. I like it so much I might get the big one for myself next time I replace my own set.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are TOO SOFT TO WORK
customer_reviews.text: This item had such high reviews so I ordered it. I'm VERY disappointed! The bristles are way to soft to sweep up anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great little broom.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I had to give a number of stars for sheerness. It’s a broom. Anyway it’s very cute, very handy and doesn’t look bad hanging in the kitchen. It has a modern look to it. I keep it hanging on my backsplash for when I chop vegetables and all those little particles of celery leaves, cabbage and broccoli stick to the counter when you’re trying to clean them up. This does a great job of it and it’s great for breadcrumbs and such too.
customer_reviews.author: jcam

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush and dustpan set. I choose it for the most stylish look of it and I wasnt disappointed. It seems to be doing a good job cleaning up. I haven't had to wash the brush up yet....so I'm not sure how well it cleans and dries after that. I'm over all please with the look and the performance of the brush and dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: just browsing

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and small
customer_reviews.text: I needed a very compact and sturdy brush to clean twigs and pine needles off my sitting bench outside. This is perfect. I don't really need the dustpan part, but I can see its usefulness if you were to use the brush inside anywhere. There are plenty of bristles to do a good job sweeping. They are strong enough to really SWEEP, but not too stiff to scratch surfaces of anything. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little brush set!
customer_reviews.text: I hung this on my kitchen wall to brush crumbs and what-not off of my counters. It is exactly what I was looking for in size, appearance, and function. Would 100% buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Broom & Pan do not fit together well/nor stay together
customer_reviews.text: Broom & Pan do not fit together well/nor stay together
customer_reviews.author: P.J. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Good dustpan, not too big not too small
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan replaced one I purchased at the local bath shop. This one far surpasses that one. The lip of the pan folks down so the dirt can be swept into the pan. The bristles are nice & soft so they won't scratch the floor. I hope the item stays in stock because I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C. McYoung

customer_reviews.title: This pair is an excellent design with the brush fitting beautifully into the hand
customer_reviews.text: This pair is an excellent design with the brush fitting beautifully into the hand, the edge of the dustpan allowing for maximum gathering of debris, and the back edge of the dustpan and an angle which will make you wonder why no one ever made them any other way. Then there's the beautiful and happy color. Bristles seem to be great quality. Overall, I'd highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: James A. Yochum

customer_reviews.title: Not just easy, but fun too!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked perfectly for me. After lunch or snacks the grandkids would leave the table covered in crumbs. They were good enough to clear after themselves, but those crumbs were always left behind. Now, with this handy set, they fight about who’s going to sweep up the crumbs each time!
customer_reviews.author: N,

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not the best product to clean inside a tent. It takes a couple of tries before it can actually scoop anything up. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Narea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little guy!
customer_reviews.text: Even my kids love to use this to help “clean” haha! I had to buy a small dust pan because I can’t stand using my huge one attached to my commercial broom , and I’m sure as heck not going to use my hand vacuum to suck up food from my toddler. This is a good little work horse!
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: perfect dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Ok who writes a review for a dustpan? Me, I felt I should pass along how great this thing is. The brush fits snuggly in the pan and the pan has a good edge on it. What makes it great is the brush has a little scraper nub on the end for those weird bits that stick to the floor and the pan has ridges on top so you can scrape the hair that is caught in the brush! Also, this thing stands up on its own when you store it - it doesn't fall over. It's the lamborghini of dust pans.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Elvina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around
customer_reviews.text: This little set is perfect for small messes on my counters! Durable, compact, great design, price and functionality. I would definitely buy it again and recommend it. Originally I purchased two and received only one. When I contacted Full Circle they were prompt and courteous, and sent me the missing item as well as a free gift! I could not be happier with my purchase, thanks Full Circle, I am now a fan!
customer_reviews.author: C. Maia

customer_reviews.title: Space saving mini and cool!
customer_reviews.text: Finally threw away the bulky broom and dust pan I had In favor of this! Why didn’t I realize a space saving mini version like this existed before? It’s cool, it’s mini and it’s functional. Def not intended for huge spills but for your everyday stuff it will do the job. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Sliderguy

customer_reviews.title: It's crazy how much I love this little dust pan
customer_reviews.text: It's crazy how much I love this little dust pan. It is the perfect tool for cleaning crumbs from the tray and floor around our highchair. I'm pretty sure my son threw my first brush in the trash and I felt completely lost without it. I had to immediatly order a replacement because this is such a big part of my life! It's cute, functional, and makes me happy every time I use it, which when you're cleaning up messes, means it's totally worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning after your cat!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy little brush. I really like the sturdiness of the brush. Cleans very well. I mainly bouy it to clean around my cat's litter box and it's made such a difference. I also like that the end of the dustpan is made of soft plastic, like silicone? This makes it feel like it won't immediately break if it falls.
customer_reviews.author: Ismarí

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: handle broke in first 5 minutes, although I glued it back with super glue. bristles stick out at weird angles.
customer_reviews.author: SS in the Blue Ridge

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The dustpan is awesome! The brush is large. I bought the full size broom as well. I love the look of these products AND they are well made/work well
customer_reviews.author: butter

customer_reviews.title: Itty bitty but works well
customer_reviews.text: Great little dust pan. I use it to sweep up piles I sweep with a normal size broom. The pan is good because you can sweep up all the tiny pieces that other dust pans annoyingly leave behind. It was smaller than I expected though. But overall happy with this baby broom!
customer_reviews.author: Megan 4295

customer_reviews.title: Sides high to the end so you have a gap.
customer_reviews.text: The little dust pan sides are high all the way to the end so you can’t slide it so the bottom is flush with the bottom of the table or counter. I had another one that had a little flat ledge that allowed you to put the pan against the table without a gap.
customer_reviews.author: Oldhide

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for van and tiny space dwellers.
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a tiny space, you cannot beat this little tiny dustpan and brush.... Well constructed and hangs easily. Pretty wooden handle on the brush is a nice contrast. Another must-have item if you live in tiny spaces or a van dwell.
customer_reviews.author: Eve McLain - Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stay in Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: I love this little brush and dustpan for my daughter to play with and I use on small spills, however, the handle pops out of the dustpan super easily which is kind of frustrating when I want to hang it up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very functionally friendly.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an adorable piece and works just as good as any other small broom but it’s very difficult to get the broom out of the dustpan. The handle that makes is so attractive snaps right in to the dustpan but the only way to get it out is to basically lift the brushes and get behind there which isn’t the cleanest way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrie Belavy

customer_reviews.title: Bristles not great
customer_reviews.text: The bristles aren’t durable enough so I find that it doesn’t do a great job. Also much smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Loren H.

customer_reviews.title: mediocre broom and dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is OK. But the design is poor, the broom won't stay secure in the dustpan after use, just falls out. If I could go back in time, knowing what I know now, would not order again, as there are probably much better options at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Cute little brush, perfect for kids to help out.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little mini brush. Bought it so my 2 year old can help sweep when she wants to. Perfect for her little hands and she loves going around the house to "sweep." Got docked a star because I found the bristles to be a little flimsy for when an adult is trying to use the item. Overall it is still a useful and cute (which is a rare term for a cleaning item) product.
customer_reviews.author: Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little broom! Exactly what I was looking for to sweep up crumbs and shed in my bearded dragons enclosure! Since there's no handle on the side I can easily move it around without maneuvering all weird.... And it's lightweight. Got every tiny crumb.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little handy dandy duster! So cute and so sturdy. I went back and fourth a few times on whether or not I should get it because of the bad reviews but I’m glad I have it a change. Helps soooo much cleaning up after my tornado toddler
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great little brush and dustpan. I use it for cleaning crumbs off of the breakfast table. It is small a will fit into practically any drawer. I find myself using this brush and dustpan more often than expected.
customer_reviews.author: OnTexasTime

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little broom but make sure you look at measurements because it is a small handheld broom and dust pan, which is exactly what I was looking for. Very sturdy and love the contrast of he wood handle.
customer_reviews.author: NeolithicX

customer_reviews.title: Good Small Whiskbroom and Pan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to use on counter tops and stove. Really good size for that. For being a small pan it has high sides which can be useful or gets in the way depending on what you are working on. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: P_Haag

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I could be so excited about a broom! I love this and it’s so easy to use! I use a large dry mop for most of my house and then use them to pick up everything once I get all of the dirt into one location.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, but exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning out my rats cage...I like to keep this as a separate broom than what I would use in the rest of my house because...poop. The circle handle is easy to hold and its small enough to get the corners good. It also looks really nice ! The plastic tray seems like it might be a bit flimsy, but I wouldn't expect it to be a problem unless you're a very aggressive sweeper or stress cleaner. :) I would note that this is a bit smaller than your standard hand broom.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Serious flaw harms a good product
customer_reviews.text: I agree with a previous review here that the lack of bristles at the top of the brush reduce its usefulness for getting at debris in corners or under things. Almost ALL my dirt is in corners or under things. Otherwise, good looking, well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Flummoxed

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. More than i wanted to spend for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small dustpan set for sweeping up desks and workbenches. This is perfect. More than i wanted to spend for this purpose, but for the size i wanted and higher qualities materials, it's great. The connection between brush and ring is super sturdy and it snaps into the dustpan very surely. This will last for years! Only complaint ... I wish it wasn't this awful green color.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Good product, recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the product a few days. Used it right away in the garage, where I do some wood working and other things. Bristles are soft but yet sturdy, handle is comfortable with good gripping material. Dust pan works well.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my robot vacuum brush with this
customer_reviews.text: The tiny brush that came with my robot vacuum was way too small to do a good job. I use this to clean the dust bin, filter, and the outside of the unit. With more surface area and a stiffer brush, it does a much better job. Also like the snap in brush holder. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the cat box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep next to the litter box (cuz you know how kitties love to fling litter) and its perfect for sweeping up the small area around the box daily. plus its adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Brie ford

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice design, and perfect use at my dining room table; the brush handle could use a small protruding tab or other modification to pop it out of the dustpan, I have to grab it by the bristles. other than that, very cute and functional.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom. So stylish that it’s not weird to have hanging in the kitchen in full view
customer_reviews.author: Penny MP Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! I use this every day to spot clean my guinea pigs fleece bedding. It's strong and the bristles hasn't strayed yet. The handle is good quality and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: Cute but functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who likes nice brushes. I used it the other day and was pleasantly surprised. The brush is soft and picks up light debris. Great brush for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Beedon

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a spare handbroom to have easily accessible as I follow my baby around, cleaning up his crumbs. This looks nice, works well, and stores easily. I also like the depth of the dust pan. Overall, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for little spills
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for sweeping up the kitchen counter when we spill things like coffee grounds. I NEVER use it on the floor so I couldn’t tell you how it works for things like dog hair, but for little spills like cracker crumbs, coffee grounds, rice etc it’s great! I like the size because I can sneak it into a corner in my cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Standard dustpan and brush set. It's a nice sturdy hard plastic, i've dropped it a few times without any issue. Brush bristles are sturdy as well. No issues with this product. Delivered quickly and with intact packaging. Also, the item i purchased was a dust pan and brush set, not reusable lunch bags
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Large, lightweight dust pan
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feature of scraping off the brush onto the dust pan, but the actual function isn't as helpful as I had hoped. It causes more static electricity flipping the dust out of the pan. If I don't use that feature, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MT Geri

customer_reviews.title: Love for frequent cleaning of the floor
customer_reviews.text: It's great for quickly picking up dirt from the hardwood floor. It picks up well. The deep dustpan is useful. I like that it's made out of recycled material. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Adorable mini broom
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure about paying $11 for a mini sweeper but it works well and is beautiful. I use it to keep my home office tidy. Lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MrsKing07

customer_reviews.title: SMALL JOBS ONLY!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to pick up crumbs/tiny debris in my bathroom and kitchen cabinets. It works really well for my purposes, but make sure you understand how small this thing is before you purchase! It's great for crumbs, but not good for anything bigger- even cat litter. My wife and I both like this product as an alternative to wiping out cabinets with a paper towel or rag.
customer_reviews.author: Karsen Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, nice quality , perfect for those small clean ups in my craft room, and the design allows me to hang this up so it's always in reach.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: It’s a dust pan
customer_reviews.text: I got the small version with the round handle - the bristles are just the right stiffness and the lip on the pan makes good, even contact with the floor/surface so dust isn’t just sliding under or around it. Super pleased with this cute little dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Finch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning a small animal cage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to aid in cleaning up the guinea pig’s cage. Perfect size for the job. Also is easy to clean as the bristles don’t seem to get much stuck to them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Over priced..
customer_reviews.text: Ha, this tiny little JOKE..I saw one all most just like it at the dollar store. Way over priced...Oh well..
customer_reviews.author: Merlyn C. Liess

customer_reviews.title: Two-year-old is in love!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my two-year-old daughter so she can help. It’s great for her. She will scream if I try to take it. Probably too small to be useful to an adult except in very specific situations like a broken cup, but man if you want your kid to clean the floor this is the product! (Admittedly I catch her using it to try to comb her hair sometimes, but boundaries are tough!)
customer_reviews.author: Erica V. Matos

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have got something else
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are too soft and push stuff around and sideways. Also the brush doesn’t stay in the dustpan at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something small to go in the room where I keep our cats' litter box, to sweep up the litter that escapes. This is a sturdy and cute broom! It arrived quickly and in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: KittyC

customer_reviews.title: Does What a Dustpan & Mini Broom Do...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small dustpan and broom to sweep up small spills in my basement. I have it hanging on a nail, doesn’t take up much space and like that I can hang it so only the dustpan portion shows.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sweep up the pet area. I like that it’s small, easy to store, and use. The handle is great. I would recommend this for anyone with a toddler to teach them how to sweep up after meals. My nephew is 19 months and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s so tiny!
customer_reviews.text: Even with the pictures I didn’t realize until I opened the box how tiny it was lol. It’s adorable tho. I plan on using it to sweep up my arts and crafts table.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha BG

customer_reviews.title: Adorable dustpan?
customer_reviews.text: I love this for small messes in my tiny space. Soft material. The silicone line on the edge makes for great cleanup, and don’t have to keep brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Miniature and may be scuffed
customer_reviews.text: Wooden part was a little scuffed upon arrival... Also is smaller than expected (it is mini sized). Other Gotham that, it’s great though! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: This is a smooth tool.
customer_reviews.text: I am much pleased with this brush and pan, so far. I bought it to sweep up hair on the bathroom floor. I ended up also using it to clean up stray cat litter from the floor when scooping the box. It does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: gypsywidow

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and I love the look
customer_reviews.text: It's small and can be tucked away easily. It's aesthetically pleasing to have around. But the real reason I give it five stars is that the rubber edge is very thin but sturdy, which means when sweeping up small bits, it's one sweep and done....nothing escapes underneath, like my last three dustpans.
customer_reviews.author: AMQCS

customer_reviews.title: Great little find!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great little hand sweeper. Love it for my counter tops and have it setting onthe side of the fridge
customer_reviews.author: IAmMe8eMmAI

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little whisk broom and dustpan for sweeping crumbs off counters and tables. I love when form perfectly meets function! Highly recommend if you need a tiny broom and dustpan set!
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Montessori kids love these
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my Montessori classroom with 30+ preschoolers. They're lasting very well with heavy use, easy to use, create a good seal for sweeping up so particles don't go under the dustpan part.
customer_reviews.author: Catlyn

customer_reviews.title: Such a little guy
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than you think and it doesn’t clip in together very well so when I hang it up they come undone. Other than those two things i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Celicia

customer_reviews.title: A green green broom and dustpan!  Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for a better dustpan and this one is perfect! The little flexible edge helps get the dirt in the dustman and then there are teeth that help wipe the nice and wide brush off! We like these very much!
customer_reviews.author: erin joy

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I would be able to clean my bearded dragons tank out easier and it did the job! The only complaint I have is that it didn’t snap back into its holder, I had to melt the sides of the holder in order to mold it better for it to snap into place. Other than that, works great and is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Small pan/broom combo - perfect for sweeping out a tent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for camping to clean out tents on the trail. It's small enough to backpack with... almost. It's the smallest broom/pan I have found so far. Certainly small enough for packing light on the trail, The only complaint I have is the large wooden ring. Takes up space and adds weight. Otherwise, not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: Great size for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little dustpan and hand broom for my kids to help sweep crumbs from our dinner table before wiping it down.
customer_reviews.author: EMUELLER

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is pretty and small and does well what it's supposed to do. I use it to sweep litter around my cat's litterbox. It is small enough not to take up much space in my bathroom, which is just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Holding up fairly well. Even though the scraper on the broom part is an awesome idea, it does make it difficult to get into corners.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenswolf13

customer_reviews.title: Dust pan & hand brush
customer_reviews.text: Worth purchasing! Appears durable and it made from recycle products.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Cat

customer_reviews.title: after months of use
customer_reviews.text: After months of usage this thing really holdup well. Its still as good as day 1 very easy to use and store and size is perfect! Go for it this one will not disappoint you
customer_reviews.author: Rada

customer_reviews.title: Well made, large dustpan and brush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect large size and well made to efficiently pick up crumbs. Love the color....easy to see in a dark or cluttered closet!
customer_reviews.author: S. Merriam

customer_reviews.title: Super tiny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small crumb messes in kitchen so you don’t have to break out the big broom or vacuum
customer_reviews.author: CPatterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Nice a compact, good for tables. Will be looking for a slightly larger one for a kitchen countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Mars

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. We use it by our espresso machine to easily clean up scattered coffee grounds. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Raya L.

customer_reviews.title: Cleanest Table in Florida
customer_reviews.text: Very nice touch to be able to sweep the crumbs up from the table once you are done eating........
customer_reviews.author: The Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Get your chores done!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's job is to sweep up certain areas of the kitchen and she loves this mini broom and dustpan combo. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning up your tent while camping
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cleaning up my tent while camping! It’s small and lightweight. I do wish the broom part snapped into the dust pan more securely.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Holder

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Brokm
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! We bought it so he could help clean up, and we love the materials and size!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is perfect
customer_reviews.text: First of all, visually it's beautiful to look at. Yes, a dustpan! Secondly, it is made so that nothing gets brushed under the pan. It has a perfect outer edge that doesn't let anything slip by. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, works even better.
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush and pan. Works well as expected. I like that the brush nests. I like that the are teeth on the pan to clean it. And I like that it can be hung up.
customer_reviews.author: AAYudinova

customer_reviews.title: Table Crumb broom
customer_reviews.text: Clearly I didn't read the dimensions, as it was WAY smaller than I thought. I wanted a small hand broom for the kitchen and this is more for crumbs on the table! Other than that - nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kuhns

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use it to wipe the crumbs off my counter when I'm making bread or my husband makes a mess with the toaster. Rinses clean.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

product_meta.title: Full Circle Tiny Team Mini Brush and Dustpan Set, Green
product_meta.description: Color:Green| Size:MiniFrom under-the-highchair cleanups to litter box overflow, no job is too small for this adorable pair. Measuring a mere 7”x 7”, they’re totally cute and limitlessly useful.
feature_bullets: Goes from dining to bedroom (and beyond)
Hangs or stands for easy storage
Earth friendly materials: Bamboo, recycled plastic, silicone, rubber
